title: Gone
overview: Gone is the fictional story of Kit "Kick" Lannigan, survivor of a famous child abduction case and Frank Novak, the FBI agent who rescued her. Determined never to fall victim again, Kick trains in martial arts and the use of firearms. She finds her calling when Booth persuades her onto a special task force he created dedicated to solving abductions and missing persons cases. Paired with former Army Intelligence officer John Bishop, Kick brings her unique understanding of the mind of a predator.
